title: The ‘Mare of Easttown’ Season Finale With Creator Brad Ingelsby
description:
Chris and Andy break down the finale of ‘Mare of Easttown’ and how the episode wrapped up all those unanswered questions (1:00). Then they are joined by creator Brad Ingelsby to talk about how he decided to end the series and working with Kate Winslet (31:45).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guest: Brad Ingelsby
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
